# Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


# Data Import

```{r}
data_dummy <- read_csv2('../../raw_data/data_dummy.csv')
```

Show the dataframe
```{r}
data_dummy
```

The goal is to merge duplicates of rows. The criterion for duplicates is 
* same `proj_id` value
* same `date` value
